name: 1 x iShisha stick (NO NICOTINE) - 500 puffs - Flavoured electronic cigarette/Shisha sticks
description:
WRITE YOUR MIX & MATCH SELECTION ON THE NOTES SECTION ON PAYPAL

iShisha = a flavoured electronic cigarette. Allow us to explain further: We would like to think of iShisha as a revolution in smoking. First, we had the normal cigarette, then the shisha (hookah), then the electronic cigarette. Now we bring you the portable electronic shisha - the iShisha.

* Any flavour
* 500 Puffs (Equivalent to 35 cigarettes)
* White LED. Lights up when inhaling.
* NO tobacco.
* NO nicotine.
* NO tar.
* NO Carbon Monoxide.
* Legal indoors in UK (Please check if ordering from different country)

Follow iShisha on Twitter: @iShishaAnywhere
Like iShisha on Facebook: www.facebook.com/iShishaAnywhere

IMPORTANT NOTICE:

The iShisha should only be used by people over the age of 18. It should NOT be used by children, pets, pregnant or breast-feeding women, people with medical conditions or people who are allergic to nicotine or nicotine-related products. Please consult your doctor before using any electronic cigarette product(s).

iShisha is not intended as nicotine replacement therapy nor as a cessation device. If you wish to stop or quit smoking do not buy our products and contact your Doctor Immediately. Our products are smoking alternatives and are only for someone who wants to continue smoking.
